concept.title: Quick Start Step 1: Register an Account
concept.shortdesc: Deploying a Docker image to is the fastest and easiest way to evaluate and to begin working with . This process involves downloading and installing the necessary tools, configuring your sandbox environment, and deploying a Docker image.

stentry.note: Keep your username and password handy. You will need them during installation.
stentry.p: Registration allows you to obtain cloud credit to help cover hosting costs for your sandbox environment. Review the pricing to see what charges may be incurred if you exceed your usage limits.
